thread.title: Malala makes emotional return to old home in Pakistan

title: Malala makes emotional return to old home in Pakistan
text:
Malala makes emotional return to old home in Pakistan Sunday, April 01, 2018 - 01:32 
Nobel Peace Prize winner Malala Yousafzai burst into tears and, according to a family friend, took deep breaths as she entered her childhood home in Swat for the first time since a Taliban gunman shot her in 2012. Jillian Kitchener reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Nobel Peace Prize winner Malala Yousafzai burst into tears and, according to a family friend, took deep breaths as she entered her childhood home in Swat for the first time since a Taliban gunman shot her in 2012.
